name: isochronous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
lasting for the same amount of time, or happening repeatedly after the same amount of time: Isochronous data transfers are transfers for devices that require continuous, guaranteed bandwidth. There are periodic solutions that are neither isolated nor isochronous.
More examplesFewer examplesAn isochronous communication protocol is based on time slices rather than handshaking.Let J R2 be the set of initial conditions of all possible isochronous solutions.In a stress-timed language, the intervals between stressed syllables are isochronous.
